author: Guardian staff reporter
title: ‘Don’t Say Gay’: Disney clashes with DeSantis over Florida bill
description: Entertainment giant suspends political donations as CEO apologises for silence and governor hits back with ‘communist’ barb
content: The Walt Disney Company is suspending political donations in Florida after its chief executive suffered huge blowback for not using the companys vast influence in the state to try to quash a Republic… [+3040 chars]
